    • Field Detail

      • board

        protected Chip[][][] board
        The game state is stored in the Board object. This is a three-dimensional array of type Chip. Both players have a unique type of chip defined in the enum Chip.

      • EMPTY_SPACE

        private static final char EMPTY_SPACE

                    int x,
                    int y)
        Description copied from class: Field
        Adds the specified chip to the specified column.
        Specified by:
        addChip in class Field
        Parameters:
        c - the chip that should be added to the column.
        x - the x-coordinate of the column.
        y - the y-coordinate of the column.

      • columnFull

        public boolean columnFull(int x,
                          int y)
        Description copied from class: Field
        Checks if any more chips can be added to the column.
        Specified by:
        columnFull in class Field
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the column.
        y - the y-coordinate of the column.
        Returns:
        true if the amount of chips equals the height of the field. false if there is still room for a new chip.

      • columnHeight

        public int columnHeight(int x,

        Description copied from class: Field

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        y - the y-coordinate of the column.
        Returns:

      • checkWin

        public boolean checkWin(Chip c)
        Checks if a player has a sequence of at least the winning length somewhere in the field in some direction.
        Specified by:
        checkWin in class Field
        Parameters:
        c - The chip associated to the player
        Returns:
        true if such a sequence has been found in at least one of all the possible directions, false otherwise.

      • trace

        private boolean trace(Chip c,
                      int startX,
                      int startY,
                      int startZ,
                      int dx,
                      int dy,
                      int dz)
        Checks for a winning sequence starting from a point (startX, startY, startZ) running towards a given direction given by a trace vector [dx, dy, dz].
        Parameters:
        c - the Chip for which a winning sequence length is checked.
        startX - the x-coordinate of the starting point.
        startY - the y-coordinate of the starting point.
        startZ - the z-coordinate of the starting point.
        dx - the x-component of the trace vector.
        dy - the y-component of the trace vector.
        dz - the z-component of the trace vector.
        Returns:
        true if a sequence of the winning length has been found, false otherwise.

      • deepCopy

        public BoundedField deepCopy()
        Description copied from class: Field
        Returns an unlinked copy of the field. Changing the state of the copy will not change the state of the original.
        Specified by:
        deepCopy in class Field
        Returns:
        a copy of the field.

        Check if the field is full, i.e. no more chips can be added to any row.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
